thread.title: Assistant Athletic Director - Rancho Mirage - Sports Management
thread.title_full: Assistant Athletic Director - Rancho Mirage - Sports Management

title: Assistant Athletic Director - Rancho Mirage - Sports Management
text: The position of Assistant Athletic Director is responsible for assisting the Athletic Director in the overall operations and programming of the athletic facility, with primary oversight of the operating standards, systems and practices as they directly impact the overall operating excellence of the department.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
